text:
Hi, im using smart content variables to include in my link on an email. All working fine on the main preview/html version. In plain text because some of the smart content has 2 words the link breaks as it doesnt have %20. How do we “slugify” these smart content fields so they can be used in a custom link structure?

Example: `{{ personalization_token('contact.company', 'Add Agency Name') }}`
